title: addurls -> AnnexRepo.add_url_to_file: KeyError: 'command'
body:
Trying to establish generation and update of datasets from NDA.  Invocation of `addurls` is at https://github.com/yarikoptic/datalad-nda/blob/9885445e510e09183d2068264e8cded3b0bd75e7/scripts/datalad-nda#L226 .  I am using datalad master 0.13.3-230-g4f8fe6e4a with https://github.com/datalad/datalad/pull/4803 merged so I could use procedure in superdataset to setup subdatasets (`addurls` already does `superdataset.create(subdspath, ...)` so all good on that). 
<details>
<summary>the log</summary> 


</details>

Notes:
- it is again batched annexed processes time out to quit.
- I guess we better avoid plain `assert`s in the code without providing in the message details (e.g. here - the `out_json`)
